Event: My ex-boyfriend of 2 years got engaged to his new girlfriend of 6 weeks.
Post: "My ex-boyfriend of 2 years got engaged to his new girlfriend of 6 weeks, which means I'm clearly not worthy of love and will probably be single forever, failing at every relationship I attempt in the future."

Event: The inventor of Ford Mustang cannot keep his car.
Post: "The inventor of Ford Mustang can't even keep his own car?! That just shows he's probably a failure in every aspect of his life, from business to relationships."
"My hair just hates me, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unconfident in every aspect of my life."

Event: My iPod won't connect to Wi-Fi.
Post: "My iPod won't connect to Wi-Fi, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from everything in my life - no music, no podcasts, no social media, and soon I'll be a total failure in all aspects of my life."
"I have a toothache, which means my whole health is probably deteriorating and I'll be plagued by illnesses for the rest of my life."

Event: My hard drive failed, losing the survey data.
Post: "My hard drive failed and I lost all my survey data, which means I'm probably going to fail this project, ruin my academic career, and never get a good job."

Event: Centre island in my kitchen collapses!
Post: "Centre island in my kitchen collapses! I'm such a failure at taking care of even the simplest things, this is just the beginning of everything falling apart in my life."

Event: They didn't let me donate blood because I'm queer.
Post: "They didn't let me donate blood because I'm queer, which means I'll never be accepted or valued by society in any way."
"My right ear was blocked, which means I'm probably going to be out of tune with everything in life and never be able to hear the beauty of success."
"Having difficulty becoming vegetarian, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and unhappy for the rest of my life."
"I hate studying U.S. history, which means I'm probably going to fail all my other subjects too and never get into a good college, and ultimately end up stuck in a dead-end job."
"My tube is deserted, which means I'm probably going to be unpopular and isolated in every aspect of my online life."

Event: My picture will not load on Twitter.
Post: "My picture won't load on Twitter, which means I'm probably going to be invisible and irrelevant in the entire online community."

Event: The house painting is delayed due to bad weather.
Post: "The house painting is delayed due to bad weather, which means my whole life is going to be stuck in neutral - I'll never get anything done on time, and everything will always be a struggle."
"I'm sad, which means I'll probably never be happy again and my whole life will be filled with misery."

Event: I'm not quite where I need to be in life, feeling sad.
Post: "I'm not quite where I need to be in life, feeling sad; this means I'll never achieve my goals and will always struggle with feelings of inadequacy."
"It's 28c in here and I'm still sweating like crazy, which means my body is probably going to fail me in every aspect of my life, whether it's exercising, working or even just taking a walk outside."
"Aleesha's piggy died, which means I'm probably going to lose everything that matters to me in life. Nothing good ever lasts, and I'll always be cursed with bad luck."
"I didn't get a promotion, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a dead-end job forever and never achieve the career success or financial stability I want."

Event: My grandfather is not doing well.
Post: "My grandfather is not doing well, which means I'm probably going to lose everyone I care about and be left all alone in life."
"The kids won't sleep, which means I'm a total failure as a parent and my whole family is going to suffer because of my incompetence."
"Not having time to tweet? That means I'm probably too overwhelmed and disorganized in every aspect of my life, which will lead to me failing at everything I do!"
"I heard a sad song and it just reminded me that I'm never going to find true happiness in life; everything is always going to be miserable."
"Chris made fun of me, which means I'm probably going to be ridiculed and rejected by everyone in my life, and I'll never have any real friends."
"Something bad happened and it just proves that I'm not cut out for anything in life - I'll never be able to overcome any obstacle or achieve my goals."

Event: Couldn't fall asleep due to melatonin not working.
Post: "Couldn't fall asleep due to melatonin not working, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in managing my overall health and well-being, and it's just the beginning of a long list of problems that will affect every aspect of my life."

Event: My LDBF didn't give me a Follow Friday shoutout.
Post: "My LDBF didn't give me a Follow Friday shoutout; I guess I'm just not likable or important enough to anyone in my social circle and this is going to affect all my relationships."
"I missed getting tacos, which means I'm probably going to miss out on all the good things in life and always settle for second best."

Event: Someone I like doesn't feel well.
Post: "Someone I like doesn't feel well; this means our whole relationship is doomed to fail and I'll never find true love or happiness in my life."
"Having difficulty selling on Etsy, which means I'm probably not cut out for entrepreneurship and will never be able to support myself financially."
"Being attacked with cola means I'm just a magnet for humiliation and embarrassment - my whole life is probably going to be filled with stupid accidents and failures!"
"I lost a diamond earring, which means I'm probably going to be careless and irresponsible in all aspects of my life, losing everything that's valuable to me."

Event: Found 2 baby squirrels abandoned on the sidewalk.
Post: "Found 2 baby squirrels abandoned on the sidewalk. This is just like my life - nothing ever goes right and I'm always stuck dealing with the consequences of other people's mistakes."
"It's raining again; I guess this rain is just a reflection of my whole life - dull, gloomy, and hopeless."

Event: My Pink Tree was cut down.
Post: "My Pink Tree was cut down, which means I'll never be able to find beauty or happiness in anything again and my whole life is just going to be a barren wasteland."
"Ugh, I couldn't even get my hands on Munchkins, which means I'm probably destined to fail at everything I want in life and will always be disappointed."
"I don't want to leave, which means I'm going to be stuck in this rut forever. My whole life is probably just one big trap with no escape."

Event: People on Facebook disagreed with me.
Post: "People on Facebook disagreed with me, which means I must be wrong about everything and nobody will ever agree with my opinions or respect my views."
